item.description:
Four Thousand Footer Club 2010 Awards Presentation -

Join fellow finishers, past finishers, future finishers, and other peak baggers for this year's event. NEHM will meet at the Holy Grail Pub for dinner prior to the awards ceremony.

Schedule:
5:00pm
Meet at the Holy Grail Pub for Dinner
The Holy Grail Pub, a former Catholic Church, located in Epping NH, serves distinctive Irish and English pub style food and offers over 40 different beers!
http://www.theholygra...
Restaurant Phone: 603 679 9559

6:25pm
Depart Holy Grail for Stratham Cooperative Middle School


6:45pm - 7:00pm
Outdoor Presentation of canine awards, Stratham Cooperative Middle School

7:00pm - 8:30pm
Awards Ceremony in the auditorium, Stratham Cooperative Middle School
Welcome and introductions
Announcement of donations
Brief talk on trail maintenance
Presentation of awards
What's next? More peakbagging lists.


8:30pm - Friendly's Exeter, further opportunity for socializing over icecream
item.how_to_find_us: reservation will be under the name New England Hiking Meetup
item.name: AMC Four Thousand Footer Club 2010 Awards Presentation / Dinner Holy Grail Pub
